Research Seminar on High Voltage Engineering
============================================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Apr 13, 2017 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Research-Seminar-High-Voltage.jpg)

![research-seminar-high-voltage](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Research-Seminar-High-Voltage.jpg)

The Department of Electrical Power Engineering at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, together with IEEE DEIS (Dielectrics and Electrical Insulation Society) Malaysia Chapter, will be organising a research seminar as follows:

Title: Research Seminar on High Voltage Engineering

Speakers: Dr. Mohd Hafizi Ahmad (Partial Discharges), Dr. Mona Riza Mohd Esa (Lightning Physics), Dr. Zulkarnain Ahmad Noorden (Supercapacitors)

Date: 27/04/2017 (Thursday)

Time: 3.00 – 5.00 pm

Venue: P16 – Demo Room 1, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia

All students are invited.
